title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 67.2 - Credit for seniority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 67.2 - Credit for seniority

State Regulations

In promotion examinations, credit for seniority shall be
granted by the addition of points, on the basis of scales approved by the
administrative director, to the average score earned by each successful
competitor in the other parts of the examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
67.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
